Job Description: JOB DESCRIPTION   The Elemental team is a pure Erlang/Elixir stack and is largely composed of smaller groups working on separate services all interconnected. Some of the things we are working on include OAuth server, Job workers for handling daemon jobs like adding newly scraped data to database, search and recommender services. On the frontend, we use Angular.js and React.js.   Strong knowledge and must have 2+ years experience in Algorithms, Data structures, and Operating Systems   Understanding of building blocks and basic fundamentals of web and scale (Web Servers, Caching, etc.)   MUST have 1+ years of experience working with web scale backends in Python, NodeJS, Ruby   Great problem solving and logical skills, adaptable   Passion to learn and execute with perfection   Should have solid hands-on experience with one or more Ruby, Python or NodeJS web Framework(s)   Relevant programming experience - Databases, Algorithms   B.Tech / M.Tech in Computer Science, but passion and experience counts for more than the degree
